title: The Quiet American
creator_credit: Miramax, Intermedia Films, Mirage Enterprises, William Horberg, Robert Schenkkan, Staffan Ahrenberg, Roger Ford, Christopher Hampton and Phillip Noyce
brief_description: A stylish political thriller where love and war collide in Southeast Asia. Set in early 1950s Vietnam, a young American becomes entangled in a dangerous love triangle when he falls for the beautiful mistress of a British journalist. As war is waged around them, these three only sink deeper into a world of drugs, passion, and betrayal where nothing is as it seems.

constellations_other.name: Uncovering the truth
constellations_other.description: The images of Tank Man during the Tiananmen Square protests in 1989 were captured by photojournalists and shared around the world. The work of journalists has been key to uncovering abuses of power and are rich material for fictional and factual movies and TV.
